<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>true</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>sn_install_base_item</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Validate Model category</name>
        <order>200</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    if (!gs.nil(current.model_category)) {
        if (!gs.nil(current.product) && !gs.nil(current.model_category.product_model_class)) {
            if (String(current.product.sys_class_name) != String(current.model_category.product_model_class)) {
                gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Product does not belong to the product class of model category.'));
                current.setAbortAction(true);
            }
        }
        if (!gs.nil(current.asset) && !gs.nil(current.model_category.asset_class)) {
            if (String(current.asset.sys_class_name) != String(current.model_category.asset_class)) {
                gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Asset does not belong to the asset class of model category.'));
                current.setAbortAction(true);
            }
            if (String(current.asset.model_category) != String(current.model_category)) {
                gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Model category of the asset does not match with the model category of the install base.'));
                current.setAbortAction(true);
            }
        }
        if (!gs.nil(current.configuration_item) && !gs.nil(current.model_category.cmdb_ci_class)) {
            if (String(current.configuration_item.sys_class_name) != String(current.model_category.cmdb_ci_class)) {
                gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Configuration item does not belong to the ci class of model category.'));
                current.setAbortAction(true);
            }
        }
    }
    return;
})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-22 14:18:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path>
        <sys_id>255816ffad51f110f877f9eaab9a778b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Validate Model category</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Install Base Management" source="sn_install_base">7f1fc05477122300d7159b71a91061b7</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service Install Base Management">7f1fc05477122300d7159b71a91061b7</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_255816ffad51f110f877f9eaab9a778b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-18 12:24:08</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>before</when>
    </sys_script>

</record_update>
